publicFooter.description: A modern full-stack client template built with Next.js, React, and TypeScript. Everything you need to build production-ready applications.
landing.home.hero.title: Build Modern Applications with Confidence
landing.home.hero.subtitle: A production-ready client template with authentication, internationalization, role-based access control, and a beautiful admin dashboard — all built on Next.js and React.
landing.home.features.title: Everything You Need
landing.home.features.subtitle: Built with the latest technologies and best practices for modern web development.
landing.home.features.feature1.title: Authentication & Authorization
landing.home.features.feature1.descripti: Complete auth system with login, registration, password reset, role-based access control, and session management.
landing.home.features.feature2.title: Lightning Fast
landing.home.features.feature2.descripti: Static export for blazing-fast load times. Optimized builds with React 19 and the latest Next.js compiler.
landing.home.features.feature3.title: Internationalization
landing.home.features.feature3.descripti: Built-in multi-language support with URL-based locale routing and easy-to-manage translation files.
landing.home.features.feature4.title: Admin Dashboard
landing.home.features.feature4.descripti: Full-featured admin panel with user management, role management, permissions, and audit logging.
landing.home.features.feature5.title: Team Collaboration
landing.home.features.feature5.descripti: Multi-tab synchronization, event broadcasting, and real-time state management across browser tabs.
landing.home.features.feature6.title: Secure by Default
landing.home.features.feature6.descripti: Token-based authentication, route guards, permission checks, and bot protection built right in.
landing.home.cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
landing.home.cta.subtitle: Join thousands of developers building modern applications with our template. Start building today.
landing.pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
landing.pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that best fits your needs. Upgrade or downgrade at any time.
landing.pricing.free.name: Free
landing.pricing.free.description: Perfect for personal projects and getting started.
landing.pricing.pro.name: Pro
landing.pricing.pro.description: For growing teams that need more power and flexibility.
landing.pricing.enterprise.name: Enterprise
landing.pricing.enterprise.description: For large organizations with custom requirements.
landing.announcements.title: Announcements
landing.announcements.subtitle: Stay up to date with the latest news and updates from our team.
landing.announcements.item1.title: Introducing v2.0 — A Complete Redesign
landing.announcements.item1.description: We've completely redesigned the platform from the ground up. The new version features a modern UI, improved performance, and a more intuitive user experience. Upgrade today to experience the difference.
landing.announcements.item2.title: New Enterprise Plan Available
landing.announcements.item2.description: We're excited to announce our new Enterprise plan, designed for large organizations with custom requirements. Get dedicated support, custom integrations, and SLA guarantees.
landing.announcements.item3.title: Multi-Language Support Now Live
landing.announcements.item3.description: Our platform now supports multiple languages out of the box. Switch between English and Turkish with a single click, and contribute translations for additional languages.
landing.announcements.item4.title: Improved Security Features
landing.announcements.item4.description: We've added two-factor authentication, enhanced bot protection, and improved audit logging to keep your data safe and secure. Enable these features from your account settings.
landing.blog.title: Blog
landing.blog.subtitle: Insights, tutorials, and updates from our engineering team.
landing.blog.post1.title: Building Scalable React Applications with Feature-First Architecture
landing.blog.post1.excerpt: Learn how we organize our codebase using a feature-first architecture that scales with your team. We cover folder structure, barrel exports, and separation of concerns.
landing.blog.post1.author: Alex Johnson
landing.blog.post2.title: Type-Safe API Clients: A Practical Guide
landing.blog.post2.excerpt: Explore how to build a type-safe API client using TypeScript generics, Zod validation, and TanStack Query for reliable data fetching with full type inference.
landing.blog.post2.author: Sarah Chen
landing.blog.post3.title: Internationalization in Next.js Without Server-Side Rendering
landing.blog.post3.excerpt: A deep dive into implementing i18n in a statically exported Next.js application using URL-based locale routing and client-side translation loading.
landing.blog.post3.author: Mike Torres
landing.blog.post4.title: Role-Based Access Control Patterns for Modern Web Apps
landing.blog.post4.excerpt: Implement fine-grained access control using guards, permissions, and route protection. Learn patterns for both UI rendering and API-level authorization.
landing.blog.post4.author: Emily Park
landing.changelogs.title: Changelog
landing.changelogs.subtitle: A detailed history of changes, improvements, and fixes across all releases.
landing.changelogs.release1.title: Major Redesign & New Features
landing.changelogs.release1.change1: Complete UI redesign with modern component library
landing.changelogs.release1.change2: Public landing pages with pricing, blog, and announcements
landing.changelogs.release1.change4: Fixed locale switching not persisting across tabs
landing.changelogs.release2.title: Admin Panel & Multi-Language Support
landing.changelogs.release2.change1: Full admin dashboard with user, role, and permission management
landing.changelogs.release2.change2: Migrated state management from Context API to Zustand
landing.changelogs.release2.change3: Fixed session token not refreshing on expiration
landing.changelogs.release3.title: Security & Performance Improvements
landing.changelogs.release3.change2: Fixed dark mode flash on initial page load
landing.changelogs.release3.change3: Removed legacy API client in favor of new fetch wrapper
landing.changelogs.release4.title: Initial Release
landing.changelogs.release4.change1: Authentication system with login, register, and password reset
landing.changelogs.release4.change2: Dashboard with user statistics and activity overview
landing.legal.privacy.title: Privacy Policy
landing.legal.privacy.section1.title: Information We Collect
landing.legal.privacy.section1.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, update your profile, or contact us for support. This includes your name, email address, and any other information you choose to provide.
landing.legal.privacy.section2.title: How We Use Your Information
landing.legal.privacy.section2.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process transactions, send you technical notices and support messages, and respond to your comments and questions.
landing.legal.privacy.section3.title: Information Sharing
landing.legal.privacy.section3.content: We do not share your personal information with third parties except as described in this policy. We may share information with service providers who perform services on our behalf, or when required by law.
landing.legal.privacy.section4.title: Data Security
landing.legal.privacy.section4.content: We take reasonable measures to help protect your personal information from loss, theft, misuse, unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest.
landing.legal.privacy.section5.title: Cookies & Tracking
landing.legal.privacy.section5.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to collect and track information about your activity on our service. You can control cookies through your browser settings and other tools.
landing.legal.privacy.section6.title: Contact Us
landing.legal.privacy.section6.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@example.com. We will respond to your inquiry within 30 business days.
landing.legal.terms.title: Terms of Service
landing.legal.terms.section1.title: Acceptance of Terms
landing.legal.terms.section1.content: By accessing or using our service, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, you may not access or use the service. We reserve the right to update these terms at any time.
landing.legal.terms.section2.title: Description of Service
landing.legal.terms.section2.content: Our platform provides a web application template with authentication, user management, and administrative tools. The service is provided on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis without warranties of any kind.
landing.legal.terms.section3.title: User Accounts
landing.legal.terms.section3.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.
landing.legal.terms.section4.title: Acceptable Use
landing.legal.terms.section4.content: You agree not to use the service for any unlawful purpose or in any way that could damage, disable, or impair the service. You may not attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of the service or its related systems.
landing.legal.terms.section5.title: Limitation of Liability
landing.legal.terms.section5.content: In no event shall we be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or relating to your use of the service, whether based on warranty, contract, tort, or any other legal theory.
landing.legal.terms.section6.title: Governing Law
landing.legal.terms.section6.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which the company is established. Any disputes arising from these terms shall be resolved through binding arbitration.
